title: Big brown beastie, big brown face
brief_description: Film about Bill Roycroft, world famous Australian horseman who has represented Australia in five Olympic games. Tells of his life with horses and competition riding and shows him at a dressage event in Canada. Also covers the Australian Equestrian Team at the Montreal Olympic Games in 1976. Princess Anne appears in a dressage event at the games. Title music by Mike Oldfield. No other credits available.
